/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The buildings lining the street are painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
